member.name: T:Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamTagCloud
member.summary: is a control that allows a list of objects to be displayed in a cloud-like fashion where weight can be assigned to the object based on their frequency of occurrence. Objects are scaled according to their weight so that words with greater weight will normally be displayed at a larger size; objects with less weight will be displayed at a smaller size with. A can contain any content so it's not simply limited to displaying text tags.
